//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "fuse_door", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{

	task ( "open" )
	{
		play ( /*@PLAY_TYPES*/ "PLAY_ROFF", "scripts/finca4/fuse_box.rof" );
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_ANNOUNCER, "sound/movers/doors/kam_pipe/open.mp3" );
	}

	do ( "open" );
	wait ( 2000.000 );
	use ( "fuse_spark" );
	use ( "fuse_spark_light" );
}
